新時代: (しんじだい) - new period; new age; new epoch
新暦: (しんれき) - the solar calendar; the Gregorian calendar
新曲: (しんきょく) - new piece; new song
新書: (しんしょ) - new book; 17 x 11 cm paperbook book
新書判: (しんしょばん) - paperback pocket edition (approx. 17x11 cm)
新月: (しんげつ) - new moon; crescent moon
新期: (しんき) - new season (e.g. of TV programming); new term
新材料: (しんざいりょう) - new material; exotic material
新株: (しんかぶ) - new stocks or shares
新株予約権: (しんかぶよやくけん) - share warrant; subscription warrant; call option
新株予約権付社債: (しんかぶよやくけんつきしゃさい) - bond with warrant attached; warrant bond; WB
新株引受権: (しんかぶひきうけけん) - pre-emptive right (to subscribe for new shares)
新案: (しんあん) - new idea or design; novelty
新案特許: (しんあんとっきょ) - patent on a new device
新植民地主義: (しんしょくみんちしゅぎ) - neo-colonialism
新横綱: (しんよこづな) - {sumo} wrestler newly promoted to grand champion
新樹: (しんじゅ) - tree covered in fresh green leaves; newly green trees of early Summer
新機能: (しんきのう) - new functionality; new feature
新機軸: (しんきじく) - innovation; new departure; milestone; breakthrough
新歓: (しんかん) - new members (e.g. club)/new students/freshman; event to welcome new students, club members, etc. (e.g. welcome party)
新歓コンパ: (しんかんコンパ) - welcome party for new students, club members, etc.
新正月: (しんしょうがつ) - January (according to the new calendar)
新法: (しんぽう) - new law; new method
新派: (しんぱ) - new school (of thought, etc.); new drama
新海苔: (しんのり) - first dried nori after the winter
新涼: (しんりょう) - coolness of autumn; first cold air of autumn
新湯: (しんゆ) - clean, freshly poured bath; hot water just poured into a bath that no one has entered yet
新潟県: (にいがたけん) - Niigata Prefecture (Hokuriku area)
新玉: (あらたま) - unpolished and uncut gem
新玉の: (あらたまの) - welcome (new year, new spring, etc.)
新生: (しんせい) - rebirth; new birth; nascent
新生児メレナ: (しんせいじメレナ) - neonatal melena (melaena)
新生児溶血性疾患: (しんせいじようけつせいしっかん) - hemolytic disease of the newborn (haemolytic); erythroblastosis fetalis
新生児頭部皮膚炎: (しんせいじとうぶひふえん) - cradle cap
新生児黄疸: (しんせいじおうだん) - neonatal jaundice
新生物: (しんせいぶつ) - neoplasm; tumor; tumour
新生面: (しんせいめん) - a new phase or aspect
新甫: (しんぽ) - new futures on the first trading session of the month
新田: (あらた) - new rice field/newly developed rice field; wasteland or marshland newly reclaimed as a rice field (Edo period)
新発: (しんぼち) - neophyte; new monk (or nun); new convert (to Buddhism)
新発売: (しんはつばい) - new product or model
新発意: (しぼち) - neophyte; new monk (or nun); new convert (to Buddhism)
新発見: (しんはっけん) - new discovery; new invention
新登場: (しんとうじょう) - a new product joining a group of other products
新盆: (しんぼん) - first Obon following one's death
新相撲: (しんすもう) - {sumo} "new" sumo (for women) conducted on a mat, wearing leotards instead of a mawashi
新着: (しんちゃく) - new arrivals; new acquisitions
新着情報: (しんちゃくじょうほう) - What's New (esp. on webpages, programs, or newsletters); announcements of new arrivals or events
新知識: (しんちしき) - advanced information; new ideas
新石器時代: (しんせっきじだい) - new stone age; neolithic
新社会人: (しんしゃかいじん) - new members of society (esp. after turning 20 or joining a company); new working adults
新種: (しんしゅ) - new species; new variety
新築: (しんちく) - new building; new construction
新粉: (しんこ) - rice flour; rice flour dough
新精霊: (にいじょうりょう) - spirit of someone on the first O-Bon after their death
新紀元: (しんきげん) - new era or epoch
新約: (しんやく) - new contract/new agreement; New Testament
新約全書: (しんやくぜんしょ) - New Testament
新約聖書: (しんやくせいしょ) - New Testament
新素材: (しんそざい) - advanced materials; new high-tech materials
新緑: (しんりょく) - fresh verdure; new green leaves
新義真言宗: (しんぎしんごんしゅう) - Shingi Shingon ("New Shingon" school of Buddhism)
新聞に載る: (しんぶんにのる) - to appear in the newspaper
新聞倫理綱領: (しんぶんりんりこうりょう) - Japan's press code (developed in 1946)
新聞受け: (しんぶんうけ) - newspaper slot; newspaper box
新聞報道: (しんぶんほうどう) - newspaper report; press reporting
新聞売り: (しんぶんうり) - newspaper-seller; newsboy; newspaper vendor
新聞売店: (しんぶんばいてん) - newsstand; newspaper kiosk; newspaper stand
新聞学問: (しんぶんがくもん) - (yoji) knowledge gained (information acquired) from newspapers
新聞屋: (しんぶんや) - newspaper stand/newspaper seller/paper carrier; newspaper reporter
新聞広告: (しんぶんこうこく) - newspaper advertisement
新聞業: (しんぶんぎょう) - the newspaper industry
